        public void create(IWindow window)
        Description copied from interface: IWindowRenderer
        Creates this renderer using the given window.

        Must be called from the main thread.

      • createContext

        public void createContext()
        Description copied from interface: IWindowRenderer
        Creates the rendering context for this renderer.

        Must be called from the thread that the renderer will be associated to.

        Can only be called after IWindowRenderer.create(IWindow) has been called.

        Specified by:
        createContext in interface IWindowRenderer

      • destroyContext

        public void destroyContext()
        Description copied from interface: IWindowRenderer
        Destroys the rendering context for this renderer.

        Must be called from the thread that this renderer is associated to.

        Can only be called after IWindowRenderer.createContext() has been called.

        Specified by:
        destroyContext in interface IWindowRenderer

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: IWindowRenderer
        Destroys this renderer.

        Can only be called after IWindowRenderer.destroyContext().

        Specified by:
        destroy in interface IWindowRenderer
